name: Santa Vs Yeti HD
description:
Jump in and help Santa through this unique amazing game with a delightful flying experience using your skills through this physics full dynamic cool adventure.

It’s fun being Santa but it can be tricky too. Help Santa bring joy to the children so that everyone has a Merry Christmas.

Fly casually but don’t be too relaxed, Christmas is just around the corner and things can get really frantic. Make sure Santa gives the right presents to all the boys and girls.

Discover Santa’s many obstacles along the way, collect letters attached to balloons from children all over the world. Watch out for sneaky bats and find lost presents. Catch snowflakes and make snows ball missiles. Don’t get too close to the angry Yeti…Yeti gets angry!

NOTE: Compatible with iPhone pro and up.

FEATURES:
-Unique 3D physics filled dynamic fun flying game
-Increase flying abilities on advancing levels
-beautifully illustrated storyline and rendered scenes

This app is optimised for iPhone 5.
